articles.title: Palestinian bid for UN membership set for Security Council vote - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: US vetoes UN Security Council resolution that recommended the State of Palestine’s full membership in the world body.
articles.content:
The United States has vetoed a widely supported resolution at the UN Security Council (UNSC) that would have paved the way for the state of Palestine to gain full membership at the United Nations.
